name: ARTcohort
title: ART cohort
description: Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register.

mapping.name: Digital Adaptation Kit for Antenatal Care

element.definition: Month and year client originally started ART (documented) at a health facility in the system. The cohort is a group of patients who started ART in the same month (or quarter) and year, whose status is followed over time, using the ART register.
element.comment: Data type may vary by country and context, but often will include month and year
